episodes.title: ACS: Sal Masekela and Matt Atchity
episodes.summary: Vice TVs Sal Masekela joins for a podcast about hosting the X-Games, his dads contributions to the music world, and his thoughts on President Trump. Plus, Matt Atchity comments on the Oscars, and the critic that's ruining everyones 100% Rotten Tomatoes scores.
tags: Talk Radio
Carolla Digital The Adam Carolla Show ACS: Sal Masekela and Matt Atchity Click on this item for more information.

episodes.title: ACS: Greg Proops and Vinnie Tortorich
episodes.summary: Greg Proops sits down to discuss the importance of listening in improv, Alec Baldwin's parody Trump memoir, and the Biden family affair. Plus, Vinnie Tortorich goes back in time with Adam as the guys look at never-before-seen pictures from Adam's childhood.

episodes.title: ACS: Live from Levity Live in Oxnard
episodes.summary: Adam, Gina, and Bald Bryan are live from Levity Live in Oxnard. Adam opens the show remembering when he use to party in Isla Vista, Santa Barbara on Halloween. Then the gang plays a round of "What Can't Adam Complain About". After that, a spirited Academy Awards edition of "The Rotten Tomatoes Game". Before they wrap, Adam and Bryan react to Gina's daily news stories.
